path: ./Audit_Reports_2024/Callisto_Network/TraderDAOai Smart Contract Audit Report by Callisto Network.md

findings.title: Crosschain Address Collisions:
findings.description: Transactions can be mistakenly sent to a contract's address on a different chain (ETH, ETC, CLO, etc.).

findings.title: Standard ERC20-Related Issues:
findings.description: The contract can inadvertently receive ERC20-token deposits without the ability to reject them, and it's recommended to incorporate a function that allows for the extraction of any number of such unintended tokens from the contract.

findings.title: Missing docstrings
findings.description: The contracts in the code base lack documentation, hindering reviewers’ understanding of the code’s intention and making it difficult to correctly assess security and correctness.

findings.title: Missing test suite
findings.description: The contract is missing a test suite to validate and verify the behavior of the contract functionalities.

findings.title: Missing zero address checks
findings.description: In several places in the code, addresses are passed as parameters to functions without validating that the passed address is not the address 0.
